title: Unica
content: Anyone know if Unica is still available?
author: TdG

comments.content:
Or maybe he means Gurtler's Unica, which is a cross between Helvetica and Univers (and the only Grot I like). Yes, it's available, through FontHaus and/or maybe FontShop.
